title: Chaoji Yi Zi
synopsis: In the vast universe, there is a gourmet planet called Kukkaka. On the planet, the gourmet elf Yizi and his friend Tuwanzi accidentally came to the earth through the four-dimensional black hole and were saved by the children of the earth, Alan and Yami. Yi Zi and Alan became good friends. Yizai possesses the food abilities that can bring happiness and joy to people. The owner of Food City, Mu, finds that Yizai's food can awaken his lost sense of taste, so he wants to catch Yizai. I didn't expect Xiao Yizi to transform into a super Yizi, and with the help of Alan and Yami, he repeatedly frustrated Boss Mu's arrest plan! In the process of Boss Mu hunting down Yizi, Ellen, Yizi, Boss Mu and his men were accidentally involved in a black hole and returned to the planet Kukkaka. On the novel and beautiful planet of Kuka, there are many funny and interesting stories between Boss Mu and the food elves! The kind and brave elves finally helped Boss Mu and Ellen find a way back to Earth! (translated from iqiyi)
